content.rendered:
Versatility is what makes Patrick stand out amongst the pack. His internationally trained work Germany gives his hairdressing a refined polish and sophistication.

With great diversity in his work, Patrick is fearless when it comes to transforming hair to look its very best. His charming warm personality mixed with infectious energy has resulted in a cult like following of clients who have followed him around Sydney.

A Certified Master Colourist, Patrick has worked backstage on numerous fashion weeks, earning him the title of Mr Versatility. “If you cant walk out with a smile and be completely happy with your hair – I haven’t done my job properly.”

Availability: Wednesday, Thursday, Friday & Saturday.

excerpt.rendered: Patrick’s charming personality and infectious energy has resulted in a cult like following.
